Title: Extends certain provisions authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Skaneateles
Summary: Extends certain provisions authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Skaneateles to 12/31/2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 328 of the laws of 2023, amending the tax law relating to authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Skaneateles, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
